title: get products list
description: Verify that the GET /api/products endpoint returns a list of products with correct details and appropriate status codes for success and failure scenarios.

title: create new product with image upload
description: Test the POST /api/products endpoint to create a new product including image upload functionality, ensuring the image is correctly processed and associated with the product.

title: update product by id
description: Validate the PUT /api/products/[id] endpoint to update product details by product ID, checking for correct update and proper error handling for invalid IDs.

title: delete product by id
description: Test the DELETE /api/products/[id] endpoint to delete a product by its ID, verifying successful deletion and appropriate error responses for non-existent IDs.

title: batch fetch products
description: Verify the POST /api/products/batch endpoint returns accurate and complete product details for a batch of product IDs.

title: manage product collections
description: Test the GET and POST /api/collections endpoints to list and create product collections, ensuring correct data handling and response codes.

title: manage customer details
description: Validate the GET, PATCH, and DELETE /api/customers and /api/customers/[id] endpoints for retrieving, updating, and deleting customer details including addresses and order history.

title: process orders management
description: Test the GET, PATCH, and DELETE /api/orders and /api/orders/[id] endpoints for listing, updating, and deleting orders, including order item management and error handling.

title: coupon validation and deletion
description: Verify the GET /api/coupons, GET /api/coupons/[code], and DELETE /api/coupons/[code] endpoints for listing coupons, validating coupon codes, and deleting coupons with correct status codes and constraints.

title: authenticated cart operations
description: Test the authenticated cart management endpoints GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE /api/cart and /api/cart/[itemId] for adding, updating, and removing cart items, ensuring Firebase authentication and permission enforcement.
